dt: {bc}to suppress or alter (something, such as a vowel or syllable) by elision
{bc}to strike out (something, such as a written word)

et: Latin {it}elidere{/it} to strike out, from {it}e-{/it} + {it}laedere{/it} to injure by striking
shortdef: to suppress or alter (something, such as a vowel or syllable) by elision
to strike out (something, such as a written word)
to leave out of consideration : omit
